subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka flew back to New York to undergo an M.R.I. on his right elbow and was later placed on the disabled list with what the team described as elbow inflammation.
snippet: Masahiro Tanaka flew back to New York to undergo an M.R.I. on his right elbow and was later placed on the disabled list with what the team described as elbow inflammation.
